verbose_text: Phagocytosis of polystyrene MPs involves a non canonical form of autophagy termed LC3-dependant phagocytosis (LAP) which results in translocation of LC3 to the phagocytic cup and the formation of single-membrane autophagosomes, in the presence [XREF_BIBR] or absence of TLR agonists [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: translocation of LC3 to the phagocytic cup
